text: Sainte-Honorine-des-Pertes is a former commune. It is found in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the new commune of Aure sur Mer.Arrêté préfectoral 9 December 2016 == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: Sainte-Honorine-des-Pertes
